resources.string: Greetings!\nAnd welcome to Stevenson Tour Guide!
My name is Eldon Stevenson Jr. and I\'ll be your tour guide today!
I realize my building can be very difficult to navigate, but don\'t fret!\nI\'m here to help!
How can I help you today?
Tour Guide Mode allows you to take a tour of all of Stevenson\'s buildings.
You\'re outside the lecture halls?\nGreat! Let\'s get started!\nProceed through the doors ahead.
You have now entered Building 4\n(the Lecture Halls).

If you're in a lab science like
Chemistry, Geology, Physics, etc.
your class will probably be in
one of these 2 rooms.
Let\'s head down this staircase\nto your left.
In front of you is still Room 4309,\none of the rooms we saw upstairs.
The lecture halls are so large\nthat they take up 2 floors.
To the right of that is\nthe lower level of Room 4327.
If you walk pass the staircase,\nyou\'ll eventually enter\nBuilding 1 (the Math Building).
For now though, let\'s this way,\ntoward the AED sign.
If you walk down this hallway,\nyou\'ll eventually enter\nBuilding 3 (the Library).
